title: Bone and Steel
description: Jacob was a take-what-he-wants, go-as-he-pleases kind of man. Ally, on the other hand, was a studious young woman looking to get ahead in life and make a career for herself. So when her best friend and roommate, Kate, falls for a member of Jacob's motorcycle gang, Ally inadvertently gets drawn in as Jacob takes her as his property. Introduced to a life of rough and sensual motorcycle gang mayhem, Ally realizes what she really wants and needs in a man. But can she handle it?  This updated 2nd edition of Bone and Steel is a romantic, FULL LENGTH erotic MC romance that is guaranteed to leave you panting for more.
author: Talia Day
